data.meta_description: Learn about Victor Schertzinger on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Victor Schertzinger, such as Something to Sing About.
data.text: Former concert pianist who contributed the score to Thomas Ince's "Civilization" (1916), among other silents, and made his directorial debut in 1917. Schertzinger cranked out numerous silent and sound films (confecting scores for many of them), and is best known for directing two of the Hope-Crosby-Lamour "Road" films.
